PackageOracle.name: DA_SERVICE_ORDER_FULFILLMENT
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_SERVICE_ORDER_FULFILLMENT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.16.957146000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,service_order_event_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,service_order_event_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_service_order_fulfillment;

body.name: DA_SERVICE_ORDER_FULFILLMENT
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_SERVICE_ORDER_FULFILLMENT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.16.979592000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_service_order_fulfillment.add(fx), parms=' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_service_order_fulfillment a
(
a.service_order_event_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_service_order_event_id.NEXTVAL
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.service_order_event_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_service_order_fulfillment.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_service_order_fulfillment.add, parms=' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_service_order_fulfillment a
(
a.service_order_event_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_service_order_event_id.NEXTVAL
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_service_order_fulfillment.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,service_order_event_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_service_order_fulfillment.add, parms=' || service_order_event_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_service_order_fulfillment a
(
a.service_order_event_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.service_order_event_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_service_order_fulfillment.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,service_order_event_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_service_order_fulfillment.del, parms=' || service_order_event_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_service_order_fulfillment a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.service_order_event_id = del.service_order_event_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_service_order_fulfillment.del');

END del;

END da_service_order_fulfillment;
